Key Match Events: Magri scored for Cameroon in the 51st minute.
Bayo scored for Guinea in the 10th minute.
Magri received a yellow card in the 21st minute.
Moukoudi received a yellow card in the 62nd minute.
Diakhaby received a yellow card in the 63rd minute.
Kamano received a yellow card in the 45+3rd minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon are the second-most successful nation in AFCON history with five titles.
Guinea beat Nigeria in their sole warm-up match before the tournament.
Cameroon drew 1-1 with Zambia in their warm-up match.
Cameroon will be without Bryan Mbeumo due to ankle surgery.
Andre Onana will arrive less than 24 hours before kickoff due to club commitments.
Vincent Aboubakar may have to withdraw from the competition due to an injury.
Guinea's star striker Serhou Guirassy is doubtful due to a thigh injury.
Liverpool's Naby Keita is expected to captain Guinea.
